pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Franklin D. Roosevelt Library and Museum
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Collection includes recordings of speeches of the President, political speeches and radio appearances by administration spokesmen, radio dramatizations produced by government agencies and political and nonpolitical radio addresses by associates and members of the President's family, including his wife, Eleanor and mother Sara Delano Roosevelt.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: Radio related material produced during Roosevelt's years in office may be in more than one collection.
